messages.subject: personal note
messages.msgSnippet: Today is my twenty-fifth wedding anniversary, and I have a sick husband.  He was up and down all night, but went to work anyway, and came home a few hours
messages.messageBody:
Today is my twenty-fifth wedding anniversary, and I have a sick
husband. He was up and down all night, but went to work anyway, and
came home a few hours later. I think it's just flu.

The anniversary celebration is here, then.
http://sandradodd.blogspot.com/2009/03/silver-bells-twenty-five-years-of.html

There are words there that should boost any marriage or relationship
with child or friend.

There will be more photos later. Those on the blog are links. I went
through the guestbook and e-mailed as many people as I have e-mails
for, and it was quite a few. More than half of the people who were at
my wedding are still in my life, if they're alive, and only one
connection separated, in most cases, otherwise.

Sandra
